00049 /*******************************************************************************
00050  ********************************  DEFINES  ************************************
00051  ******************************************************************************/

00053 /* LS013B7DH03 SPI commands */
00054 #define LS013B7DH03_CMD_UPDATE     (0x01)
00055 #define LS013B7DH03_CMD_ALL_CLEAR  (0x04)
00056 
00057 /* Frequency of LCD polarity inversion. */
00058 #ifndef LS013B7DH03_POLARITY_INVERSION_FREQUENCY
00059 #define LS013B7DH03_POLARITY_INVERSION_FREQUENCY (64)
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 #ifdef USE_CONTROL_BYTES
00063 #define LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES     (2)
00064 #else
00065 #define LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES     (0)
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 #ifdef PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT
00069 
00070   #ifdef USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL
00071     /* Static pool has been chosen for pixelmatix allocation.
00072        Disable the use of malloc for allocation of pixel matrices. */
00073     #undef USE_MALLOC
00074   #endif
00075 
00076   #ifdef USE_MALLOC
00077     /* malloc has been chosen for pixelmatix allocation.
00078        Disable the use of static pool for allocation of pixel matrices. */
00079     #undef USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL
00080   #endif
00081 
00082 #endif /*  PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT  */

00091 typedef uint8_t PixelMatrixAlign_t;
00092 #else
00093   #if (1 == PIXEL_MATRIX_ALIGNMENT)
00094     typedef uint8_t PixelMatrixAlign_t;
00095   #elif (2 == PIXEL_MATRIX_ALIGNMENT)
00096     typedef uint16_t PixelMatrixAlign_t;
00097   #elif (4 == PIXEL_MATRIX_ALIGNMENT)
00098     typedef uint32_t PixelMatrixAlign_t;
00099   #else
00100     #error Unsupported PIXEL_MATRIX_ALIGNMENT.
00101   #endif
00102 #endif

00110 /* Static variables: */
00111 static uint8_t        lcdPolarity = 0;
00112 
00113 #ifdef PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT
00114 #ifdef USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL
00115 #define PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL_ELEMENTS                                \
00116   (PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL_SIZE/sizeof(PixelMatrixAlign_t) +            \
00117    ((PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL_SIZE%sizeof(PixelMatrixAlign_t))? 1 : 0))
00118 static PixelMatrixAlign_t  pixelMatrixPoolBase[PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL_ELEMENTS];
00119 static PixelMatrixAlign_t* pixelMatrixPool = pixelMatrixPoolBase;
00120 #endif

00166 /**************************************************************************/
00171 EMSTATUS DISPLAY_Ls013b7dh03Init(void)
00172 {
00173   DISPLAY_Device_t      display;
00174   EMSTATUS              status;
00175 
00176   /* Initialize the Platform Abstraction Layer (PAL) interface.  */
00177   PAL_TimerInit();
00178   PAL_SpiInit();
00179   PAL_GpioInit();
00180 
00181   /* Setup GPIOs */
00182   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_SCLK,    LCD_PIN_SCLK,    palGpioModePushPull,0);
00183   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_SI,      LCD_PIN_SI,      palGpioModePushPull,0);
00184   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_SCS,     LCD_PIN_SCS,     palGpioModePushPull,0);
00185   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_DISP_SEL,LCD_PIN_DISP_SEL,palGpioModePushPull,0);
00186   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_DISP_PWR,LCD_PIN_DISP_PWR,palGpioModePushPull,0);
00187   PAL_GpioPinModeSet(LCD_PORT_EXTMODE, LCD_PIN_EXTMODE, palGpioModePushPull,0);
00188 
00189 #ifdef PAL_TIMER_REPEAT_FUNCTION
00190   /* If the platform specifies to use a timer repeat function we should
00191      register the DisplayPolarityInverse to be called every second in
00192      order to toggle the EXTCOMIN pin at 1Hz.
00193   */
00194   status =
00195     PAL_TimerRepeat((void(*)(void*)) DisplayPolarityInverse, 0,
00196                     LS013B7DH03_POLARITY_INVERSION_FREQUENCY);
00197 #elif defined POLARITY_INVERSION_EXTCOMIN_PAL_AUTO_TOGGLE
00198   /* Setup system (via PAL) to toggle the EXTCOMIN pin every second. */
00199   status = PAL_GpioPinAutoToggle(LCD_PORT_EXTCOMIN, LCD_PIN_EXTCOMIN,
00200                                  LS013B7DH03_POLARITY_INVERSION_FREQUENCY);
00201 #else
00202   /* System does not support toggling the EXTCOMIN pin. Return error. */
00203   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED;
00204 #endif
00205   if (PAL_EMSTATUS_OK != status)
00206   {
00207     return status;
00208   }
00209   
00210   /* Setup and register the LS013B7DH03 as a DISPLAY device now. */  
00211   display.name                  = SHARP_MEMLCD_DEVICE_NAME;
00212   display.colourMode            = DISPLAY_COLOUR_MODE_MONOCHROME_INVERSE;
00213   display.addressMode           = DISPLAY_ADDRESSING_BY_ROWS_ONLY;
00214   display.geometry.width        = LS013B7DH03_WIDTH;
00215   display.geometry.height       = LS013B7DH03_HEIGHT;
00216   /* stride = pixels + ctrl bytes */
00217   display.geometry.stride       =
00218     display.geometry.width + LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES*8;
00219 
00220   display.pDisplayPowerOn       = DisplayEnable;
00221 #ifdef PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT
00222   display.pPixelMatrixAllocate  = PixelMatrixAllocate;
00223   display.pPixelMatrixFree      = PixelMatrixFree;
00224 #else
00225   display.pPixelMatrixAllocate  = NULL;
00226   display.pPixelMatrixFree      = NULL;
00227 #endif
00228   display.pPixelMatrixDraw      = PixelMatrixDraw;
00229   display.pPixelMatrixClear     = PixelMatrixClear;
00230   display.pDriverRefresh        = DriverRefresh;
00231 
00232   status = DISPLAY_DeviceRegister (&display);
00233 
00234   if (DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK == status)
00235   {
00236     /* Turn on display. */
00237     DisplayEnable(&display, true);
00238 
00239     /* Clear display */
00240     DisplayClear();
00241   }
00242      
00243   return status;
00244 }

00251 /**************************************************************************/
00258 static EMSTATUS DriverRefresh(DISPLAY_Device_t* device)
00259 {
00260   EMSTATUS      status = DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00261 
00262   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00263 
00264   /* Reinitialize the timer and SPI configuration.  */
00265   PAL_TimerInit();
00266   PAL_SpiInit();
00267 
00268   return status;
00269 }

00272 /**************************************************************************/
00285 static EMSTATUS DisplayEnable(DISPLAY_Device_t* device,
00286                               bool              enable)
00287 {
00288   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00289 
00290   if (enable)
00291   {
00292     /* Set EFM_DISP_SELECT pin. */
00293     PAL_GpioPinOutSet(LCD_PORT_DISP_SEL, LCD_PIN_DISP_SEL);
00294     /* Drive voltage on EFM_DISP_PWR_EN pin. */
00295     PAL_GpioPinOutSet(LCD_PORT_DISP_PWR, LCD_PIN_DISP_PWR);
00296   }
00297   else
00298   {
00299     /* Stop driving voltage on EFM_DISP_PWR_EN pin. */
00300     PAL_GpioPinOutClear(LCD_PORT_DISP_PWR, LCD_PIN_DISP_PWR);
00301     /* Clear EFM_DISP_SELECT pin. */
00302     PAL_GpioPinOutClear(LCD_PORT_DISP_SEL, LCD_PIN_DISP_SEL);
00303   }
00304 
00305   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00306 }
00307 
00308 
00309 /**************************************************************************/
00316 static EMSTATUS DisplayClear ( void )
00317 {
00318   uint16_t cmd;
00319   
00320   /* Set SCS */
00321   PAL_GpioPinOutSet( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00322   
00323   /* SCS setup time: min 6us */
00324   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(6);
00325   
00326   /* Send command */
00327   cmd = LS013B7DH03_CMD_ALL_CLEAR | lcdPolarity;
00328   PAL_SpiTransmit ((uint8_t*) &cmd, 2 );
00329   
00330   /* SCS hold time: min 2us */
00331   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(2);
00332   
00333   /* Clear SCS */
00334   PAL_GpioPinOutClear( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00335   
00336   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00337 }

00340 #ifdef PAL_TIMER_REPEAT_FUNCTION

00342 /**************************************************************************/
00350 static EMSTATUS DisplayPolarityInverse (void)
00351 {
00352 #ifdef POLARITY_INVERSION_EXTCOMIN
00353   
00354   /* Toggle extcomin gpio */
00355   PAL_GpioPinOutToggle( LCD_PORT_EXTCOMIN, LCD_PIN_EXTCOMIN );
00356   
00357 #else /* POLARITY_INVERSION_EXTCOMIN */
00358   
00359   /* Send a packet with inverted com */
00360   PAL_GpioPinOutSet( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00361   
00362   /* SCS setup time: min 6us */
00363   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(6);
00364 
00365   /* Send polarity command including dummy bits */
00366   PAL_SpiTransmit ((uint8_t*) &lcdPolarity, 2 );
00367 
00368   /* SCS hold time: min 2us */
00369   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(2);
00370       
00371   PAL_GpioPinOutClear( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00372 
00373   /* Invert com polarity */
00374   if (lcdPolarity == 0x00)
00375   {
00376     lcdPolarity = 0x02;
00377   }
00378   else
00379   {
00380     lcdPolarity = 0x00;
00381   }
00382 
00383 #endif /* POLARITY_INVERSION_EXTCOMIN */
00384 
00385   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00386 }
00387 
00388 #endif /* POLARITY_INVERSION_EXTCOMIN_PAL_AUTO_TOGGLE */

00391 #ifdef PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT
00392 /**************************************************************************/
00410 static EMSTATUS PixelMatrixAllocate( DISPLAY_Device_t*      device,
00411                                      unsigned int           width,
00412 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00413                                      unsigned int           userStride,
00414 #endif
00415                                      unsigned int           height,
00416                                      DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t *pixelMatrix)
00417 {
00418 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00419   unsigned int allocSize = (userStride/8 + LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES) * height;
00420 #else
00421   unsigned int allocSize = (width/8 + LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES) * height;
00422 #endif
00423 
00424   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00425 
00426   if (width != LS013B7DH03_WIDTH)
00427     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OUT_OF_RANGE;
00428 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00429   if (userStride < width)
00430     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00431 #endif
00432 
00433 #ifdef USE_MALLOC
00434 
00435   /* Allocate the pixel matrix buffer including 2 control bytes per line. */
00436   *pixelMatrix = (DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t) malloc (allocSize);
00437 
00438   if (NULL == *pixelMatrix)
00439     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_ENOUGH_MEMORY;
00440   else
00441     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00442 
00443 #endif /* USE_MALLOC */
00444 
00445 #ifdef USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL
00446 
00447   if (((uint8_t*)pixelMatrixPool)     + allocSize >
00448       ((uint8_t*)pixelMatrixPoolBase) + PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL_SIZE)
00449   {
00450     *pixelMatrix     = NULL;
00451     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_ENOUGH_MEMORY;
00452   }
00453   else
00454   {
00455     *pixelMatrix     = pixelMatrixPool;
00456     pixelMatrixPool += allocSize / sizeof(PixelMatrixAlign_t) +
00457       ((allocSize % sizeof(PixelMatrixAlign_t))? 1 : 0);
00458     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00459   }
00460 
00461 #endif /* USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL */
00462   
00463 }
00464 #endif /* PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT */
00465 
00466 
00467 #ifdef PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT
00468 /**************************************************************************/
00478 static EMSTATUS PixelMatrixFree( DISPLAY_Device_t*     device,
00479                                  DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t pixelMatrix)
00480 {
00481   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00482 
00483 #ifdef USE_MALLOC
00484   free(pixelMatrix);
00485   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00486 #endif /* USE_MALLOC */
00487 
00488 #ifdef USE_STATIC_PIXEL_MATRIX_POOL
00489   /* The non-malloc PixelMatrixAllocate function only allocates buffers
00490      consequtively from a pool. It is not possible to free the buffers.
00491      I.e. this allocator can only be used for one-shot allocations of
00492      buffers that will should never be freed and re-alloced.
00493   */
00494   (void) pixelMatrix;   /* Supress compiles warning: unused parameter. */
00495   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED;
00496 #endif
00497 }
00498 #endif /* PIXEL_MATRIX_ALLOC_SUPPORT */

00501 /**************************************************************************/
00518 static EMSTATUS PixelMatrixClear( DISPLAY_Device_t*      device,
00519                                   DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t  pixelMatrix,
00520                                   unsigned int           width,
00521                                   unsigned int           height)
00522 {
00523   uint8_t*       pByte = (uint8_t*) pixelMatrix;
00524   unsigned int   i;
00525 
00526   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00527   (void) width;  /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00528   
00529   for (i=0; i<height; i++)
00530   {
00531     /* Clear line */
00532     memset(pByte, 0, LS013B7DH03_WIDTH/8);
00533     pByte += LS013B7DH03_WIDTH/8;
00534 
00535 #ifdef USE_CONTROL_BYTES
00536     /* Set dummy byte. */
00537     *pByte++ = 0xff;
00538     /* Set address of next line */
00539     *pByte++ = i+1;
00540 #endif
00541   }
00542 
00543   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00544 }
00545 
00546 
00547 #ifdef USE_CONTROL_BYTES
00548 /**************************************************************************/
00559 static EMSTATUS pixelMatrixSetup( DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t  pixelMatrix,
00560                                   unsigned int           startRow,
00561                                   unsigned int           height
00562 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00563                                   ,
00564                                   unsigned int           userStride
00565 #endif
00566                                   )
00567 {
00568   int       i          = 0;
00569   uint8_t*  pByte      = (uint8_t*) pixelMatrix;
00570 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00571   int       strideGap  =
00572     (userStride-LS013B7DH03_WIDTH-(LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES*8)) /
00573     8 / sizeof(uint8_t);
00574   if ((userStride-LS013B7DH03_WIDTH) % sizeof(uint16_t))
00575     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00576 #endif
00577   
00578   while (i<height)
00579   {
00580     pByte += LS013B7DH03_WIDTH/8;
00581     /* Set dummy byte. */
00582     *pByte++ = 0xff;
00583 
00584     if (i == height-1)
00585     {
00586       /* Set dummy data at end of last line. */
00587       *pByte++ = 0xff;
00588       break;
00589     }
00590     else
00591       /* Set address of next line */
00592       *pByte++ = startRow + (++i);
00593 
00594 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00595     pByte += strideGap;
00596 #endif
00597   }
00598 
00599   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00600 }
00601 
00602 #endif /* USE_CONTROL_BYTES */
00603 
00604 
00605 /**************************************************************************/
00622 static EMSTATUS PixelMatrixDraw( DISPLAY_Device_t*      device,
00623                                  DISPLAY_PixelMatrix_t  pixelMatrix,
00624                                  unsigned int           startColumn,
00625                                  unsigned int           width,
00626 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00627                                  unsigned int           userStride,
00628 #endif
00629                                  unsigned int           startRow,
00630                                  unsigned int           height )
00631 {
00632   unsigned int i;
00633   uint16_t*    p = (uint16_t *)pixelMatrix;
00634   uint16_t     cmd;
00635 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00636   int          strideGap =
00637     (userStride-width-(LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES*8)) / 8 / sizeof(uint16_t);
00638   if ((userStride-width) % sizeof(uint16_t))
00639     return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_INVALID_PARAMETER;
00640 #else
00641   (void) width;  /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00642 #endif
00643   (void) startColumn;  /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00644   (void) device; /* Suppress compiler warning: unused parameter. */
00645 
00646   /* Need to adjust start row by one because LS013B7DH03 starts counting lines
00647      from 1, while the DISPLAY interface starts from 0. */
00648   startRow++;
00649 
00650 #ifdef USE_CONTROL_BYTES
00651   /* Setup line addressing in control words. */
00652   pixelMatrixSetup(pixelMatrix, startRow, height
00653 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00654                    , userStride
00655 #endif
00656                    );
00657 #endif
00658 
00659   /* Assert SCS */
00660   PAL_GpioPinOutSet( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00661 
00662   /* SCS setup time: min 6us */
00663   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(6);
00664   
00665   /* Send update command and first line address */
00666   cmd = LS013B7DH03_CMD_UPDATE | (startRow << 8);
00667   PAL_SpiTransmit((uint8_t*) &cmd, 2 );
00668 
00669   /* Get start address to draw from */
00670   for ( i=0; i<height; i++ ) {
00671         
00672     /* Send pixels for this line */
00673     PAL_SpiTransmit((uint8_t*) p,
00674                     LS013B7DH03_WIDTH/8 + LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES);
00675     p+=(LS013B7DH03_WIDTH/8 + LS013B7DH03_CONTROL_BYTES) / sizeof(uint16_t);
00676 
00677 #ifndef USE_CONTROL_BYTES
00678     if (i==height-1)
00679     {
00680       cmd = 0xffff;
00681     }
00682     else
00683     {
00684       cmd = 0xff | ((startRow+i+1) << 8);
00685     }
00686     PAL_SpiTransmit((uint8_t*) &cmd, 2 );
00687 #endif
00688 
00689 #ifdef EMWIN_WORKAROUND
00690     p += strideGap;
00691 #endif
00692 
00693   }
00694   
00695   /* SCS hold time: min 2us */
00696   PAL_TimerMicroSecondsDelay(2);
00697   
00698   /* De-assert SCS */
00699   PAL_GpioPinOutClear( LCD_PORT_SCS, LCD_PIN_SCS );
00700 
00701   return DISPLAY_EMSTATUS_OK;
00702 }
